channel.title: Project Raw | Stable Economy | Unique Content | Staff Needed
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://project-raw.org/forums/images/twist-sd/logo.png[/img]
[B][URL=http://www.project-raw.org/play.php][SIZE=4]PLAY NOW[/SIZE][/URL][/B] - [B][URL=http://www.project-raw.org][SIZE=4]FORUMS[/SIZE][/URL][/B] - [B][URL=http://www.project-raw.org/vote/#?step=1][SIZE=4]VOTE[/SIZE][/URL][/B]
[SIZE=4][B]Project Raw:[/B][/SIZE]
A new server based on a 317 loading 602 data is here to conquer the RSPS realm with unique and enjoyable content, stability, and a positive community. Experience rates aren't very slow but still provide a challenge for newer players. With many creative ideas being implemented into the server daily, our server is bound for success. There are currently three developers: Eazy, Adam, and Sessy Pk3r With heaps of content from challenging minigames to exotic quests, there's no doubt you'll love this server for years to come. Well, what the **** are you waiting for? Start your adventure on Project Raw! See you ingame!
[B][SIZE=4]Staff Team:[/SIZE][/B]
Our developers are very skilled and experienced as well as highly motivated in providing the best experience for our players. We try our best to remain active within our community and provide assistant whenever necessary as good managers should. But our server is still in its infancy and our developers are a bit shorthanded. Staff positions are available so we encourage you to join in and contribute.
[IMG]http://www.rs2pl.com/images/gold.gif[/img][B][SIZE=4]Economy:[/SIZE][/B] This enhanced econonmy will prove superior to all other servers. Through rigorous brainstorming and advanced alrgorithms we have the closest emulation to a perfect economy. We have successfully limited the server to very rare cases of inflation which will provide economy stability as the server increases it's member base. Join in the fun!
[B][SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE][/B]
-Voting Based on total level! -Real Barrows -Already on a VPS -Awesome Slayer -All dupes should be fixed and patched! -317 loading 602! -All skills working! -Perfect PKing and switching! -Pretty fast EXP and money! -Daily Updates -Warriors Guild -100% Pest Control -Duel Arena -100% working clues -Skill task system and Shop! -A lot of other Minigames! -Curses -PK Points system -Ton's of bosses -Eco Server -Torva, Virtus, Pernix, Dragon Defender, Hand cannon and a lot of more! -Crystal Chest -Working Summoning! -Fullscreen! -Autocasting! -Donator Benefits -Vote4Reward (Shop also) -Webclient -No LAG
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/w6pdm9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ds1mhi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ns3o2a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/11wc9yr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ja88hz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2cqmc83.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2hed5ye.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/11qtouo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2145xsn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/4k9uf8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/zxqtc8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/29kt7xu.png[/img] [/CENTER]

Everyone got their own style how they do a server and how they get players. And they are looking for staff, but they don’t pick up first time loggers.

What’s your server? Lemme comment something to there.[/quote]

item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

[CENTER]

[B][URL=http://www.project-raw.org/play.php][SIZE=4]PLAY NOW[/SIZE][/URL][/B] - [B][URL=http://www.project-raw.org][SIZE=4]FORUMS[/SIZE][/URL][/B] - [B][URL=http://www.project-raw.org/vote/#?step=1][SIZE=4]VOTE[/SIZE][/URL][/B]

[SIZE=4][B]Project Raw:[/B][/SIZE]

A new server based on a 317 loading 602 data is here to conquer the RSPS realm with unique and enjoyable
content, stability, and a positive community. Experience rates aren’t very slow but still provide a challenge
for newer players. With many creative ideas being implemented into the server daily, our server is bound for success.
There are currently three developers: Eazy, Adam, and Sessy Pk3r
With heaps of content from challenging minigames to exotic quests, there’s no doubt you’ll love this
server for years to come. Well, what the **** are you waiting for? Start your adventure on Project Raw!
See you ingame!

[B][SIZE=4]Staff Team:[/SIZE][/B]

Our developers are very skilled and experienced as well as highly motivated in providing the best experience for our players.
We try our best to remain active within our community and provide assistant whenever necessary as good managers should.
But our server is still in its infancy and our developers are a bit shorthanded.
Staff positions are available so we encourage you to join in and contribute.

[B][SIZE=4]Economy:[/SIZE][/B]
This enhanced econonmy will prove superior to all other servers. Through rigorous brainstorming and
advanced alrgorithms we have the closest emulation to a perfect economy.
We have successfully limited the server to very rare cases of inflation which will provide economy stability
as the server increases it’s member base. Join in the fun!

[B][SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE][/B]

-Voting Based on total level!
-Real Barrows
-Already on a VPS
-Awesome Slayer
-All dupes should be fixed and patched!
-317 loading 602!
-All skills working!
-Perfect PKing and switching!
-Pretty fast EXP and money!
-Daily Updates
-Warriors Guild
-100% Pest Control
-Duel Arena
-100% working clues
-Skill task system and Shop!
-A lot of other Minigames!
-Curses
-PK Points system
-Ton’s of bosses
-Eco Server
-Torva, Virtus, Pernix, Dragon Defender, Hand cannon and a lot of more!
-Crystal Chest
-Working Summoning!
-Fullscreen!
-Autocasting!
-Donator Benefits
-Vote4Reward (Shop also)
-Webclient
-No LAG












[/CENTER]
